lhmiracleroad.gui.occupation.describe.as: The once powerful assassin is searching for his ultimate destination...
lhmiracleroad.gui.occupation.describe.kn: A seasoned knight embarks on the road of conquest...
lhmiracleroad.gui.occupation.describe.ma: A solitary genius known as a monster by the world...
lhmiracleroad.gui.occupation.describe.ou: I already have nothing and can only look forward...
lhmiracleroad.gui.occupation.describe.ra: The mighty marksman who never misses, instilling fear with their ability to deliver a deadly blow in a single shot...
lhmiracleroad.gui.prompt: Press the H key to select a occupation
item.lhmiracleroad.broken_soul.tooltip.d: Like a candle about to flicker out...
item.lhmiracleroad.group_soul.tooltip.de: The broken souls support each other, struggling to survive...
item.lhmiracleroad.evil_soul.tooltip.det: Alive as demons, dead as ghosts...
item.lhmiracleroad.extremely_evil_soul.t: Death is just the beginning for it...
Forgetting... perhaps it will make us stronger...
item.lhmiracleroad.king_soul.tooltip.det: Such a warm soul, surely a great hero leaves their final mark on the world...
item.lhmiracleroad.death_soul.tooltip.de: Items related to the Grim Reaper. Requires at least 100,000 souls to use.
Grants 1 skill point upon use, with a 50% chance to double the soul.
item.lhmiracleroad.soon_elapse_soul.tool: Like a candle about to flicker out...
item.lhmiracleroad.incomplete_soul.toolt: The soul that remains is faint, and it won't be long before it disappears...
item.lhmiracleroad.stray_large_block_sou: The soul of a wanderer, unsure of its destination...
item.lhmiracleroad.adventurer_large_bloc: The soul of an adventurer, for whom death might be another path home...
The soul of an unnamed warrior...
item.lhmiracleroad.unknown_soldier_large: The large soul of an unnamed warrior, who may have been formidable in life...
item.lhmiracleroad.exhausted_knight_soul: Having fought for their homeland until they perished from exhaustion, it was their formidable strength and willpower that forged such a soul...
item.lhmiracleroad.exhausted_general_sou: Even with great strength, one is still mortal. Perhaps the final battle was fulfilling after all...
item.lhmiracleroad.liege_soul.tooltip.de: Formerly a lord, possessing strength beyond mortal admiration...
item.lhmiracleroad.greedy_gold_serpent_r: Ancient guardians vanquished one invader after another, and the ring of legend was formed from the obsession of these invaders. Greedy people will pay a heavy price for this item...
Greedy people will pay a heavy price for this item...
item.lhmiracleroad.greedy_silver_serpent: Craving soul purification, greedily searching for one fortress after another...
item.lhmiracleroad.desire_ring.tooltip.d: A craving for power from the depths of the soul...
Born in blaze, unafraid of flames...
The masterpiece of the swamp witch, immune to all poisons...
A treasure from the deep sea, the curse of water avoidance...
item.lhmiracleroad.frost_ring.tooltip.de: A treasure from the house of snow and ice, unafraid of wind and snow...
item.lhmiracleroad.life_ring.tooltip.det: A ring blessed by the saint...
item.lhmiracleroad.radiance_ring.tooltip: Only great heroes are worthy of wearing it. Perhaps in your story, the Ring of Radiance can reappear...
The legendary Ring of Radiance, immune to all negative effects in the world...
item.lhmiracleroad.recovery_ring.tooltip: A ring kissed by an angel...
item.lhmiracleroad.ring_strength.tooltip: In the chaos of war, a young man with a sword carved out a prosperous era...
item.lhmiracleroad.shielding_ring.toolti: This is a knight's story. The ring is inscribed with 'Stand in front of the ones you love...'
item.lhmiracleroad.vigilance_ring_distan: It is said that in the Land of the End, there are two pairs of eyes that can pierce through the darkness. The vertical ones represent distance, sniping distant enemies...
The farther the target, the higher the damage
item.lhmiracleroad.vigilance_ring_near.t: It is said that in the Land of the End, there are two pairs of eyes that can pierce through the darkness. The horizontal ones represent closeness, destroying desecrating enemies...
The closer the target, the higher the damage
item.lhmiracleroad.ancient_spellcraft_ri: The relic of an ancient spell master, once the lord of an ancient city...
item.lhmiracleroad.berserk_bracelet.tool: Seems to be cursed, making one restless and berserk...
item.lhmiracleroad.heavy_bracelet.toolti: The master's masterpiece, making one feel completely at ease.
item.lhmiracleroad.hunter_mark.tooltip.d: The relic of a legendary hunting master, seems to be able to carve 100 marks...
